mapper.select: select pm.sku, pm.category, pm.sub_category, pm.brand, pm.four_quadrant, pm.hs_code, pm.hs_code_desc, pm.specs, pm.weight, pm.created, pm.created_by, pm.updated, pm.updated_by, pm.status, pm.approved, pm.approved_by, pi.name_en, pi.name_jp, pi.name_zh, pi.function_en, pi.function_jp, pi.function_zh, pi.instruction_en, pi.instruction_jp, pi.instruction_zh, pi.caution_en, pi.caution_jp, pi.caution_zh, pi.ingredient_en, pi.ingredient_jp, pi.ingredient_zh, pi.origin_en, pi.origin_jp, pi.manufacturer_addr_en, pi.manufacturer_addr_jp, pi.manufacturer_addr_zh, pp.sell_price, pp.cost_price, pp.gross_margin, pp.remark, pp.status as price_status from product_master pm inner join product_info pi on pm.sku = pi.sku inner join product_price pp on pi.sku = pp.sku where pm.sku = #{sku} and pm.status != 'REMOVED'

select pm.sku, pm.category, pm.sub_category, pm.brand, pm.four_quadrant, pm.hs_code, pm.hs_code_desc, pm.specs, pm.weight, pm.created, pm.created_by, pm.updated, pm.updated_by, pm.status, pm.approved, pm.approved_by, pi.name_en, pi.name_jp, pi.name_zh, pi.function_en, pi.function_jp, pi.function_zh, pi.instruction_en, pi.instruction_jp, pi.instruction_zh, pi.caution_en, pi.caution_jp, pi.caution_zh, pi.ingredient_en, pi.ingredient_jp, pi.ingredient_zh, pi.origin_en, pi.origin_jp, pi.manufacturer_addr_en, pi.manufacturer_addr_jp, pi.manufacturer_addr_zh, pp.sell_price, pp.cost_price, pp.gross_margin, pp.remark, pp.status as price_status from product_master pm inner join product_info pi on pm.sku = pi.sku inner join product_price pp on pi.sku = pp.sku
and pm.status != 'REMOVED'
and pm.sku = #{sku}
and lower(pm.category) like '%' || #{category} || '%'
and lower(pm.brand) like '%' || #{brand} || '%'
and ( lower(pi.name_en) like '%' || #{name} || '%' or lower(pi.name_jp) like '%' || #{name} || '%' or lower(pi.name_zh) like '%' || #{name} || '%' )
order by
pp.sell_price pp.order_price pp.gross_margin coalesce(pm.updated, pm.created)
pp.sell_price desc pp.order_price desc pp.gross_margin desc coalesce(pm.updated, pm.created) desc
mapper.insert: insert into product_master (sku, category, sub_category, brand, four_quadrant, hs_code, hs_code_desc, created_by, status) values (#{sku}, #{category}, #{subCategory}, #{brand}, #{fourQuadrant}, #{hsCode}, #{hsCodeDesc}, #{createdBy}, #{status})

insert into product_info(sku, name_en, name_jp, name_zh, function_en, function_jp, function_zh, instruction_en, instruction_jp, instruction_zh, caution_en, caution_jp, caution_zh, ingredient_en, ingredient_jp, ingredient_zh, origin_en, origin_jp, manufacturer_addr_en, manufacturer_addr_jp, manufacturer_addr_zh) values (#{sku}, #{nameEn}, #{nameJp}, #{nameZh}, #{functionEn}, #{functionJp}, #{functionZh}, #{instructionEn}, #{instructionJp}, #{instructionZh}, #{cautionEn}, #{cautionJp}, #{cautionZh}, #{ingredientEn}, #{ingredientJp}, #{ingredientZh}, #{originEn}, #{originJp}, #{manufacturerAddrEn}, #{manufacturerAddrJp}, #{manufacturerAddrZh})
insert into product_price (sku, sell_price, cost_price, gross_margin, remark, status) values (#{sku}, #{sellPrice}, #{costPrice}, #{grossMargin}, #{remark}, #{status})
mapper.update: update product_info set name_en = #{nameEn}, name_jp = #{nameJp}, name_zh = #{nameZh}, function_en = #{functionEn}, function_jp = #{functionJp}, function_zh = #{functionZh}, instruction_en = #{instructionEn}, instruction_jp = #{instructionJp}, instruction_zh = #{instructionZh}, ingredient_en = #{ingredientEn}, ingredient_jp = #{ingredientJp}, ingredient_zh = #{ingredientZh}, origin_en = #{originEn}, origin_jp = #{originJp}, manufacturer_addr_en = #{manufacturerAddrEn}, manufacturer_addr_jp = #{manufacturerAddrJp}, manufacturer_addr_zh = #{manufacturerAddrZh} where sku = #{sku}
update product_price set sell_price = #{sellPrice}, cost_price = #{costPrice}, gross_margin = #{grossMargin}, remark = #{remark}, status = #{status} where sku = #{sku}
